channel.title: A Hugo website
channel.description: Recent content on A Hugo website

item.title: About
item.description: This is a test website to host academic posters, which will eventually be linked into my main site once I’m sure I’m not breaking anything.

item.title: Academic Posters
item.description: NIHR Biomedical Research Council Poster 2019 Here is a link to my poster presented at the 2019 NIHR BRC Mausdley Conference in London. WCPG Poster 2019 Here is a link to my latest poster presented at the 2019 World Congress for Psychiatric Genetics in Los Angeles

item.title: Site in Progress
item.description: In progress This site is currently under development but acts as a placeholder for academic content by Jodie Lord - a PhD student at KCL.
